title: Setup PostgreSQL Database Schema for VitaTrack
instruction: Create comprehensive PostgreSQL database schema based on the provided schema design. Implement all tables including users, user_auth, goals, weight_logs, body_measurements, meal_logs, meal_items, workout_logs, workout_exercises, exercises, exercise_categories, water_logs, sleep_logs, and user_daily_targets. Create proper primary keys, foreign keys, indexes, constraints, and triggers. Implement row-level security policies, create database roles with appropriate permissions, and setup connection pooling. Include migration scripts for schema versioning, seed data for exercise categories and sample exercises, and backup/restore procedures. Add full-text search indexes and JSONB indexes for preferences and sleep_stages.
